attributes.action: Set up cameras on cuthbert road due to the high volume of car break-in.
attributes.additional_details: We urge for the council and local MP to set up cameras on our road so that we can all feel safe again and to stop living in fear.
attributes.background: As a community we do not feel safe anymore on cuthbert road. This is due to the numerous car break-ins happening and on one incident an axe left in a driver’s seat. There are no cameras on cuthbert road and so as a community we do not feel safe as these criminals have easy access on our roads!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this would be the responsibility of the local council and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. 

You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
